en.title: Breeder Visit Guide | Etiquette and Preparation Tips for a Successful Visit
en.content:
Visiting a breeder is an important opportunity to meet your future kitten. Here is a summary of the etiquette and key points to know before your visit.

Making a Reservation

An advance reservation is always required. Drop-in visits on the day are not allowed due to infection prevention measures. If you have a preferred breed or color, let the breeder know when booking.

Etiquette on the Day

Change your clothes before visiting if you have been to a cat cafe or touched other cats (infection prevention). Wash and sanitize your hands upon arrival. Do not force kittens to be held. Keep your voice low. Ask for permission before taking photos.

Key Points to Check

Cleanliness of the cattery, the cats\' expressions and coat condition, any odors, the temperament and health of the parent cats, vaccination and deworming records, genetic testing status, the handover process, and after-sales support.

Visiting Fuluck Cattery

Fuluck Cattery accepts visits by appointment only. During your visit, we provide detailed explanations about Siberian characteristics and care, and we are happy to answer any questions you may have.

zh.title: 猫舍参观流程与礼仪 | 成功参观的准备指南
zh.content:
参观猫舍是与小猫相遇的重要时刻。以下汇总了参观前需要了解的礼仪和确认要点。

预约参观

必须提前预约。出于感染防控考虑，不接受当日临时到访。如果有心仪的猫种或毛色，请在预约时告知。

当日礼仪

如果之前去过猫咖或接触过其他猫，请换好衣服再前往（预防感染）。到达时洗手消毒。不要强行抱小猫。不要大声说话。拍照前请征得许可。

需要确认的要点

猫舍的清洁度、猫咪的神态和毛质、是否有异味、种猫的性格和健康状况、疫苗接种和驱虫记录、基因检测实施情况、交接流程、售后支持内容。

福楽猫舍的参观

福楽猫舍采用完全预约制接待参观。参观时我们会详细介绍西伯利亚猫的特征和饲养方法，也会解答您的各种疑问。
